itunes:title: Aug 29, 2022 - Preemptive Coup: The NYT Editorial Board Formally Calls For Indictment Of Trump
title: Aug 29, 2022 - Preemptive Coup: The NYT Editorial Board Formally Calls For Indictment Of Trump
description:
PREEMPTIVE COUP: The New York Times editorial board formally called for the indictment of Donald Trump; Poso points out who the true fascists are. An NYPD officer who was fired for having MAGA ties has filed a federal lawsuit against the department; Poso analyzes the war on good cops. According to the Wall Street Journal, the latest covid-19 boosters are set to roll out before human testing is completed; Poso exposes the undermining of the Constitution and American morals. Heavily armed ANTIFA militants ‘stood guard’ outside a Texas bar that was hosting a ‘kid friendly’ drag show; Poso reveals just how ‘kid friendly’ the show actually was. 



Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec
